Using Fastai UMLFit

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_sentence_encoding[source]

get_sentence_encoding(input:str, tok_type:str='classical_unigram', lm_type:str='classical_lm')

Returns a sentence enoding for input sentence using fastai UMLFit model

{% endraw %}

set tok_type and lm_typeto use different tokenizer and language model. By default it uses classical language model and classical unigram tokenizer.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

cos_sim[source]

cos_sim(v1, v2)

Return consine similarity between Tenosr v1 and v2

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_sentence_similarity[source]

get_sentence_similarity(sent1:str, sent2:str, cmp:Callable='cos_sim', **kwargs)

Return sentence similarity between sent1 and sent2usingcmp` comparison method

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sent1 = 'མུ་སྟེགས་ཚོགས་རྣམས་ཐམས་ཅད་རབ་བཅོམ་སྟེ'
sent2 = 'གཞི་རྣམས་ཀྱི་སྤྱི་སྡོམ་ལ།'
